name: Run and Gun
description:
Run and Gun is an action roguelike shooting game where you mow down thousands of enemies while unlocking newer and deadlier weapons. The enemies won't stop spawning, and your guns won't stop firing. Earn gold each run to unlock permanent upgrades to make your next run deadlier. With thousands of combinations of weapons and upgrades your can unlock, mix and match levelup strategies to find your ultimate combination.

Then, use the gold you earn in each run to unlock new mechs to radically change your playstyle up.

Supports keyboard and mouse, or a controller.
